Factsheet

Developer:
Yannis ATTARD
Based in France
Release date:
Platforms:
Windows
Website:
aless.itch.io/drowned
Regular Price:
Free

Description

Drowned is an ambiant-horrific game where you have to sneak between sea monsters to get out of the ocean

History

This game was made using Unreal Engine 4. It was made during the Enjam 2017, an intern jam for ENJMIN students. We were two programmer on the project. I did the AI of sea monsters with the UE AI tool, as well as a little tool for game designer to help them make monster's patrols.

Features

  • Unreal Engine 4
  • Simple AI using UE AI tool
  • Simple tool for game designers
  • Some game design
